title: TADM: Mechanical, Tolerance, and Dimension Management (Present)
description: Built with NodeJS for scalable and high-performance backend architecture. Utilized Prisma ORM for efficient data modeling and management. Leveraged GraphQL for flexible and robust API design. Developed with NextJS for server-side rendering and optimal performance. Written in Typescript for robust and maintainable codebase.

title: HealthCare - Extensions Development (10 months)
description: Built with Angular 14 for a robust and scalable frontend architecture. Utilized HTML5, CSS3, and Tailwind for a responsive and visually appealing UI. Integrated Material UI for a consistent and intuitive user experience. Collaborated with designers using Zeplin for seamless design-to-development handoff.

title: HealthCare Device & Data Management System (4 months)
description: Involved in frontend application development and deployment

title: Employee Verification Management System (2 years)
description: Built with PHP (Laravel 5.7) for robust backend functionality. Enhanced with HTML5, CSS, and Bootstrap 4 for a responsive and visually appealing frontend. Powered by MySQL for efficient data management. Utilized jQuery for dynamic client-side interactions. Integrated with Web Sockets for real-time communication

title: ERP System: Stock Management & Finance Management (8 months)
description: Built on PHP (Laravel 7) for a robust and scalable backend. Powered by MySQL for efficient data management. Utilized jQuery for dynamic client-side interactions. Led the application requirement analysis, designing, development, testing, and deployment on shared hosting, ensuring a seamless and efficient ERP system for stock management and finance management.
